comment._content: fantastic action shot! Also: can you imagine playing tennis with a gigantic belt buckle digging into your abdomen?

comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: according to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_U.S._Open_Women's_Singles_c... Florence Sutton was the runner-up in the 1911 U.S. Open Women's SIngles competition. And in this article: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9905E6DA1E3EE233A... she won the 1911 National Lawn tennis Chamiponship in the Women's Singles division

comment.author: 8505512@N05
comment._content: Carbonated-- a gigantic belt buckle digging into your abdomen, and an ankle length skirt. Yikes! At least she's not wearing high heels.

comment.author: 33063256@N03
comment._content: i wonder how these women played tennis with such long skirts. how uncomfortable! i guess it doesn't matter though, because she is such a good tennis player.
